Summary: A very fast B2 Bomberlike craft, moving very fast. Just a shade darker than the surrounding sky, edges seemed blured.. No Lights, No sound.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tarpon Springs
There were no other sightings in Tarpon Springs on or around March 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailsit was about 11:30 on a very nice clear night, the 20th of march 2012. i was standing outside with my dogs in the backyard. i enjoy looking at the stars and looking for the planets when i am out there, so i was looking north and up into the sky. it was a clear night sky with clouds on the northern horizon. my house was to my back and i was looking due north. i hear a pop, like a sonic boom, way off in the distance, i could not tell the direction, then out of the corner of my eye i catch movement in the night sky directly above me, slightly to the east (at the 1 o'clock position) moving rapidly north (covered the night sky in under 10 seconds). the object is about 2" in size relative to me. i concentrate to make it out as it is moving fast and there are no nav lights. (i live near 2 major airports with at least one entry pattern running right over the house, so no nav lights really caught my attention. - i guess here would be a good place to point out that i am a us army combat veteran and by habit i study my surroundings.) i looked away and back again to confirm i was seeing something, and sure enough it was there now about 1\2 way to the horizon. the shape was very much like a b2, but not black. the sky was a shade of purple, and this seemed to be just a shade darker. the edges were just a bit fuzzy, like it was out of focus. i thought it could be something in my eye until it flew behind a bank of clouds far to the north on the horizon. at first i thought it was a b2 until i thought abuot the lack of lights or noise and the speed. i have been on the ground when both f117s and b2s have flown overhead, so i was waiting for the sound. it never came.
